project.name: J-C835A-LUCE-02-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF25-01
project.description: This test takes a string, and reads through the string, printing out each character with ASCII value greater than 48. If it encounters a character with ASCII value less than 48, it will fail to increment the loop counter, and loop forever.

iopair.name: J-C835A-LUCE-02-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF25-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C835A-LUCE-02-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF25-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: search files using fuzzy searching Environment variable

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^(-|\.)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_WzcksTrQ77cj1Uc4iogH AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_fMe5V2Lm4Q OR (NOT finished_9X88tvUGni AND NOT (controlled_exit_jFvCSfW0Mx OR continued_execution_exH3dTMos7)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_fMe5V2Lm4Q OR (NOT finished_9X88tvUGni AND NOT (controlled_exit_jFvCSfW0Mx OR continued_execution_exH3dTMos7))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_fMe5V2Lm4Q OR (NOT finished_9X88tvUGni AND NOT (controlled_exit_jFvCSfW0Mx OR continued_execution_exH3dTMos7)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_fMe5V2Lm4Q OR (NOT finished_9X88tvUGni AND NOT (controlled_exit_jFvCSfW0Mx OR continued_execution_exH3dTMos7)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
